faqs.subtitle: FAQs
faqs.title: Digital marketing FAQs
faqs.description: We answer the most common questions before starting your Google Ads and social media strategy.

items.q: What results can I expect and in what timeframe?
items.a: With Google Ads you can see impact from the first week (traffic and leads). On social media, growth is progressive: reach and engagement in 2–4 weeks and conversions as the community and paid media consolidate. We report clear metrics (leads, CPA, ROAS).

items.q: Do I need a dedicated landing page for ads?
items.a: Highly recommended. A conversion‑focused landing improves contact rate: clear message, value proposition, social proof and visible form/WhatsApp. We design it and measure with GA4/Google Tag.

items.q: What is the minimum suggested budget for Google Ads?
items.a: We suggest starting with USD 300–500/mo to get meaningful data in 2–4 weeks. We adjust investment based on cost per lead and market size.

items.q: How do you measure conversions and ROI?
items.a: We implement Google Tag and GA4 to track key events (forms, calls, WhatsApp, purchases). We optimize campaigns for CPA or ROAS and share periodic reports with actionable recommendations.

items.q: What does social media management include?
items.a: Strategy, content calendar, asset design, publishing, community management and performance reports. It can be complemented with paid media to accelerate reach.

items.q: Can you work with my current website?
items.a: Yes. We audit your site, propose quick wins (speed, message clarity, CTAs) and define whether to optimize it or build a dedicated landing for campaigns.
